Nighlight/Elita::

Nighlight laugthed "She's just trying to trasform to her robot 
mode"and looking to her baby said "Don't you, sweetheart?"
She sat down and started to move her trasnformable pieces while 
elita looked and giggled, soon appeared her robot form. suddenly 
Elita's tummy roared again and the little one moaned. Nighlight took 
the energon bottle and fed her beloved daughter.
